hf.game.strategy

Interface PlayerStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FriendlyStrategy, GreedyStrategy, RandomStrategy, UnfriendlyStrategy

    public interface PlayerStrategy
    This class is the interface for player strategies.
    Author:
    sai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean placeLakeTile(GameBoard board)
      Place a lake tile on the board, this function will directly modify the board state.
      java.lang.String printReasoning()
      Provide the reasoning behind redeem lantern card, favor token and lake tile placement
      boolean redeemFavorToken(GameBoard board)
      Redeem Favor token to perform an exchange of lantern cards
      boolean redeemLanternCard(GameBoard board)
      Redeem lantern card to dedication tokens based on the strategy

    • Method Detail

      • placeLakeTile

        boolean placeLakeTile(GameBoard board)
        Place a lake tile on the board, this function will directly modify the board state.
        Parameters:
        board - board that currently is played on
        Returns:
        true if the lake tile is placed successfully

      • redeemLanternCard

        boolean redeemLanternCard(GameBoard board)
        Redeem lantern card to dedication tokens based on the strategy
        Parameters:
        board - board that currently is played on
        Returns:
        true if no exception is encountered, however the return value doesn't mean a redeem has been done, the redeem might have failed due to insufficient card

      • redeemFavorToken

        boolean redeemFavorToken(GameBoard board)
        Redeem Favor token to perform an exchange of lantern cards
        Parameters:
        board - board that currently is played on
        Returns:
        true if no exception is encountered, however the return value doesn't mean a redeem has been done, the redeem might have failed due to insufficient card

      • printReasoning

        java.lang.String printReasoning()
        Provide the reasoning behind redeem lantern card, favor token and lake tile placement
        Returns:
        reasoning for player activities
